title: a-25
body:
Listed below are custom components not supported by official Adapt development.
Some of these may require implementation through Adapt framework and will be unavilable for implementation through Adapt authoring tool interface.
Also, some of these might not work and malfunction in future releases of Adapt framework and Adapt authoring tool and thus should be monitored and updated for functionality.

title: a-30
body:
Listed below are custom question components not supported by official Adapt development.
Some of these may require implementation through Adapt framework and will be unavilable for implementation through Adapt authoring tool interface.
Also, some of these might not work and malfunction in future releases of Adapt framework and Adapt authoring tool and thus should be monitored and updated for functionality.

It is important to check those in context of responsiveness functionality as it may be not implemented in some of these.
